text: Curry first indicated back in June, that if the Golden State Warriors were invited to meet with the president as the 2016 - 2017 NBA champions, he wouldn ’ t go. He reiterated that stance on Friday, revealing that he planned to cast a “ no ” vote when the team takes a poll on whether to make the trip. He explained to reporters at the Warriors ’ Media Day, “ The things that he ’ s said and the things that he hasn ’ t said at the right times … we won ’ t stand for it.
